TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FocusManager extends System.Object
public ref class FocusManager abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供一组静态方法、附加属性和事件，用于确定和设置焦点范围以及设置该范围内具有焦点的元素。

span.span: Provides a set of static methods, attached properties, and events for determining and setting focus scopes and for setting the focused element within the scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 中有两个与焦点有关的概念： 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点。In Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) there are two concepts concerning focus: keyboard focus and logical focus. 键盘焦点与当前正在接收键盘输入的元素。Keyboard focus pertains to the element which is currently receiving keyboard input. 可以有一个具有键盘焦点的元素。There can be only one element with keyboard focus. 此元素具有键盘焦点设置为`true`。This element with keyboard focus has set to `true`. 返回具有键盘焦点的元素。 returns the element with keyboard focus. 与逻辑焦点相关特定焦点范围内。Logical focus pertains to the within a specific focus scope. 焦点范围是一个容器元素，用于跟踪其作用域内。A focus scope is a container element that keeps track of the within its scope. 默认情况下类是焦点范围以及， ，和类。By default, the class is a focus scope as are the , , and classes. 这是焦点范围的元素具有设置为`true`。An element which is a focus scope has set to `true`. 可以有多个元素具有逻辑焦点，但只能有一个具有单个焦点范围内的逻辑焦点的元素。There can be multiple elements with logical focus, but there can only be one element with logical focus within a single focus scope. 具有逻辑焦点的元素不一定具有键盘焦点，但具有键盘焦点的元素将具有逻辑焦点。An element with logical focus does not necessarily have keyboard focus, but an element with keyboard focus will have logical focus. 它是可以定义为焦点范围内的焦点范围。It is possible to define a focus scope within a focus scope. 在这种情况下，父焦点范围和子焦点范围都可以具有。In this case, both the parent focus scope and the child focus scope can have a . 下面的方案说明中具有的 WPF 应用程序如何更改键盘焦点和逻辑焦点与和一个具有。The following scenario illustrates how keyboard focus and logical focus change in a WPF application that has a with a and a which has a . 键盘焦点时从更改到，则失去键盘焦点，但保留逻辑焦点提供给焦点范围。When keyboard focus changes from the to the , the losses keyboard focus but retains logical focus for the focus scope. 获得键盘焦点，获取有关逻辑焦点焦点范围。The obtains keyboard focus and obtains logical focus for the focus scope. 当键盘焦点返回到根目录中的元素焦点范围内具有逻辑焦点会再次获得键盘焦点，在这种情况下是。When keyboard focus returns to the root , the element in focus scope with logical focus will obtain keyboard focus, which in this case is the . 现在具有键盘焦点和逻辑焦点。The now has keyboard focus and logical focus. 失去键盘焦点，但保留逻辑焦点提供给焦点范围。The loses keyboard focus, but retains logical focus for the focus scope. 默认值上， ， ，并是`true`。The default value of on a , , , and is `true`. 焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)并[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For more information on focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md) and the [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定焦点范围的逻辑焦点的元素。The is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope. 此对象可能会或可能不具有键盘焦点。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的元素。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 和可用于获取和设置指定的焦点范围内具有焦点的元素。 and can be used to get and set the focused element within the specified focus scope. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 **，则返回 true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使具有焦点的元素。The following example shows how to make a the focused element. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定焦点范围的逻辑焦点的元素。The is the element which has logical focus for a specific focus scope. 此对象可能会或可能不具有键盘焦点。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的元素。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如果`element`不是焦点范围，此方法将返回`null`。If `element` is not a focus scope, this method will return `null`. 使用，可以指定具有指定的焦点范围内的逻辑焦点的元素。Use , to specify the element with logical focus within a specified focus scope. ## Examples 下面的示例通过设置具有逻辑焦点的元素它使用获取具有逻辑焦点的元素和。The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the and it gets the element with logical focus by using the . remarks.format: ## Remarks 是具有特定焦点范围的逻辑焦点的元素。The is the element which has logical focus for the specific focus scope. 此对象可能会或可能不具有键盘焦点。This object may or may not have keyboard focus. 键盘焦点指接收键盘输入的元素。Keyboard focus refers to the element that receives keyboard input. 焦点、 键盘焦点和逻辑焦点的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information on focus, keyboard focus, and logical focus, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 就可以指定是中的元素是焦点范围的祖先的焦点范围。It is possible to specify a focus scope that is an ancestor of the focus scope the element is in. 例如，如果是焦点范围和其父级是焦点范围，的子可以指定为焦点范围时调用。For example, if a is a focus scope and its parent is a focus scope, a child of the could specify the as the focus scope when calling . 随后同时焦点范围和焦点范围。The is then for both the focus scope and the focus scope. 将提供在指定的焦点范围内指定的元素逻辑焦点并将键盘焦点元素。 will give the specified element logical focus in the specified focus scope and will attempt to give the element keyboard focus. ## Examples 下面的示例通过设置具有逻辑焦点的元素它使用获取具有逻辑焦点的元素和。The following example sets the element with logical focus by using the and it gets the element with logical focus by using the . [!code-csharp[focussnippets#FocusGetSetFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#focusgetsetfocusedelement)] [!code-vb[focussnippets#FocusGetSetFocusedElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FocusSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#focusgetsetfocusedelement)]
